description: a(n) = Sum{a(k): k=0,1,2,...,n-4,n-2,n-1}; a(n-3) is not a summand; 3 initial terms required.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-1,1).
formula: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) -a(n-3) +a(n-4); 4 initial terms required.G.f. x*(x-1)*(1+x) / ( -1+2*x-x^3+x^4 ). - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 12 2012
crossrefs: Pairwise sums of A049856. Partial sums of A049864.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
